Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES test when DUT return correct response.
Test.ExpectedResult:
DEVICE-1-1-11 ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that DUT returned Analytics capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validate analytics address (http://CAMERA_IP/onvif/media) STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT did not return device capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that DUT did not return events capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that DUT did not return imaging capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check that DUT did not return media capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that DUT did not return PTZ capabilities STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: No response
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES test when DUT return no response.
Test.ExpectedResult:
1.1.11 ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Correct fault when service is supported
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check NVT MEDIA DEVICE test when DUT return correct fault on first request.
Test.ExpectedResult:
DEVICE-1-1-11 ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetCapabilities(CapabilityCategory[] Category) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 426 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES (all services)
All services
Test.Description:
PreReq: Features.265 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES test when DUT return no response with all services instead of device only.
Test.ExpectedResult:
DEVICE-1-1-11 ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that DUT returned Analytics capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validate analytics address (http://uri1) STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT did not return device capabilities Device capabilities returned from the DUT STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

STEP 1 - Get capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that DUT returned Analytics capabilities Analytics capabilities not found STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Correct response when analytics is not supported

PreReq: Features.261 in Features_2.xml - Refresh Features
Check ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES test when DUT return correct response.

DEVICE-1-1-11 ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES
STEP 1 - Get Analytics Capabilities - negative test Transmit done Receive done "Receiver/ActionNotSupported/NoSuchService" fault is expected, but no SOAP fault returned STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Check ANALYTICS CAPABILITIES test when DUT return correct response.
